about_the_game:
Experience the excitement and exhilaration of Space Ball! Firing a rocket under everyday sports, Space Ball launches you into an arena full of action, where quick thinking and lightning reaction times are all that matter.

Featuring Football and Basketball gameplay modes, this competitive multiplayer is all about scoring points and bragging rights. Slam dunk a basketball like a pro or use your body to score a goal in football, use the arenas anyway you see fit to gain the advantage.

Space Ball features a unique movement mechanic that is easy to master. Simply use your hands to leap across the arenas. Slam them into the ground to accelerate, then use the Dash feature to soar into the rafters! You’ve never played a game of Basketball as vertical as this!

Space Ball features:

Create Private and Public matches
1vs1, 2vs2 and 3vs3 team selection
Online multiplayer and AI Bots with multiple difficulty settings
Character customisation options - be a Cat, Pigeon, or even a Capybara!
Arenas are filled with fans to bring matches to life!
Full voice chat with privacy settings

Space Ball on Steam also supports cross-play functionality with the Meta Quest version.

During Early Access we’ll be regularly updating Space Ball with new features and QoL enhancements, so don’t forget to join our Discord for all the latest updates!

name: Space Ball VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700k / AMD Ryzen 7 1800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
